Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3813924,"totalDownVotes":314679,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":78404,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

ü•ÅMusic by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":278561,"totalDownVotes":145543,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":23653,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":2650756,"creatorName":"WarriorCatsRP","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":49404,"totalDownVotes":2651,"universeId":1278035280,"name":"Warrior Cats: Ultimate Edition","placeId":3663340706,"playerCount":13408,"imageToken":"T_3663340706_c40d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Create your own Warrior Cat and roleplay in this official game based on "Warriors", The New York Times best-selling series of fantasy books.

Warrior Cats: Ultimate Edition brings the "Warriors" series off the written page and into the Roblox world!

üé®Create your own Warrior Cats, and your own story.
üêæChoose the path of a Warrior, a Medicine Cat, or perhaps even a Clan Leader!
üó∫Ô∏èExplore the Forest Territory and the Clans who inhabit it...
üí¨Develop friendships, alliances, and identify your foes!
üåüConstruct your own story in this immersive environment, and control your own destiny.

‚ö†Ô∏èThis game is Mobile/Tablet compatible, but may not run well on older phones, tablets, or computers.

Controls:
Q/E to change speeds.
V to drop held item.
Shift+P to toggle cinematic camera
